name: qianshe-archive
description: 谦舍个人博客与作品集系统

scripts.install:all: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); ['portfolio/frontend', 'portfolio/worker', 'dashboard/frontend', 'dashboard/worker'].forEach(dir => { console.log('Installing in', dir); execSync('npm install', {cwd: dir, stdio: 'inherit'}); })"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.migrate: cd database && npx wrangler d1 execute qianshe-db --file=migrations/001_initial_data.sql
scripts.clean: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); execSync('rm -rf portfolio/worker/static dashboard/worker/static node_modules portfolio/frontend/node_modules portfolio/worker/node_modules dashboard/frontend/node_modules dashboard/worker/node_modules', {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run init:db
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check-all && npm run test
scripts.quality-check: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check-all && npm run build:check && npm run test

author: qainshe
